Class: Account

Account

new Account(accountData)

Stormpath Account Object. This object encapsulates the raw account data, and provides methods for working with the account resource and it's related resources.

For a high-level overview of Account resources in Stormpath, please see Account Management.

For a description of the REST API for account objects, please see REST API Reference: Account.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
accountData Object

The raw JSON data from the account resource, as retrieved from the Stormpath REST API.
Source:
  • resource/Account.js, line 29

Extends

  • DirectoryChildResource
  • InstanceResource

Methods

addToGroup(group, callback)

Adds the account to the given group.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
group Object | String

If this parameter is a string, it should be the HREF of the group that the account will be added to.

If it is an object, it should have an href property which is the group href.
callback function

The function to call when the operation is complete. Will be called with the parameters (err, GroupMembership).
Source:
  • resource/Account.js, line 152
Examples
var groupHref = 'https://api.stormpath.com/v1/groups/xxx';
account.addToGroup(groupHref, callbackFn);
var group = {
  href: 'https://api.stormpath.com/v1/groups/xxx';
};

account.addToGroup(group, callbackFn);
var groupHref = 'https://api.stormpath.com/v1/groups/xxx';
client.getGroup(groupHref, function(err, group){
  account.addToGroup(group, callbackFn);
});

createApiKey(callback)

Creates an ApiKey for this account, which can be used to authenticate a request to your service. For more information please read Using Stormpath for API Authentication.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
callback function

The function to call when the operation is complete. Will be called with the parameters (err, ApiKey).

getAccessTokens(collectionQueryOptions, callback)

Retrieves the collection of access tokens that have been issued to this account.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
collectionQueryOptions CollectionQueryOptions

Options for querying & paginating the collection. This collection does not support attribute or filter searches.
callback function

The function to call when then the operation is complete. Will be called with the parameters (err, CollectionResource). The collection will be a list of AccessToken objects.
Source:
  • resource/Account.js, line 49

getApiKeys(options)

Retrieves a collection of the account's Api Keys.

The secret property of each resource is encrypted with the tenant API Key Secret that was used to configure the current Client instance. We do this to ensure that the secret is encrypted at rest, as it may be cached in your caching database.

Password-based AES 256 encryption is used. The PBKDF2 implementation will use 1024 iterations by default to derive the AES 256 key.

At the risk of potentially decreased security, you can use the encryptionKeySize option to specify a smaller encryption key size. You can also request a lower number of key iterations with the encryptionKeyIterations option. This can reduce the CPU time required to decrypt the key after transit or when retrieving from cache. It is not recommended to go much lower than 1024 (if at all) in security sensitive environments.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
options CollectionQueryOptions

Options for querying & paginating the collection. This collection does not support filter searches. The following options can also be used with this request:

Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
id String <optional>
 null

Search for a specific key by key id.
encryptionKeySize Number <optional>
 256

Set to 128 or 192 to change the AES key encryption size
encryptionKeyIterations Number <optional>
 1024

Number of encryption iterations.
Source:
  • resource/Account.js, line 238

getGroupMemberships(collectionQueryOptions, callback)

Retrieves the collection of group memberships for this account. Group memberships are a resource that represent the link between an account and group.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
collectionQueryOptions CollectionQueryOptions

Options for querying & paginating the collection. This collection does not support attribute or filter searches.
callback function

The function to call when then the operation is complete. Will be called with the parameters (err, CollectionResource). The collection will be a list of GroupMembership objects.
Source:
  • resource/Account.js, line 113

getGroups(collectionQueryOptions, callback)

Retrieves the collection of groups that this account is a member of.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
collectionQueryOptions CollectionQueryOptions

Options for querying & paginating the collection. This collection supports filter searches and the following attribute searches: name, description, status, createdAt, modifiedAt.
callback function

The function to call when then the operation is complete. Will be called with the parameters (err, CollectionResource). The collection will be a list of Group objects.
Source:
  • resource/Account.js, line 91

getProviderData(callback)

Get the account's provider data resource. The provider data resource contains information about this account's link to a third party provider, such as Google.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
callback function

The function to call when the operation is complete. Will be called with the parameters (err, ProviderData).
